Dialogue.Page: Mod: Hearth’s Neighbor Authors: GameWyrm, EndgameZero, Lumine0409, and FunkyShoeMan
Hearth’s Neighbor is the mod that won first place in the second mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community.

This mod sees the player traveling to a new star system with a single, lonely planet orbiting its star. Don’t let the planets’ size fool you though, it has plenty more to see than initially meets the eye!

There is good reason that this mod won first place in the jam, as it uses a combination of New Horizons and custom code to introduce more puzzles, mechanics, and exotic locations not seen in the base game.
